Player History
Drafted in 9th round, 162nd overall pick, by St. Louis in 1969...
Drafted in 9th round, 162nd overall pick, by St. Louis in 1969...
Released by St. Louis on 4/1/1969...
Drafted in 1st round, 14th overall pick, by San Francisco in 1972...
Traded from San Francisco to Chicago (N) on 1/31/1972 (Going to CHC: P R. Jones. Going to SF: C J. Sevcik)...
Traded from Chicago (N) to New York (A) on 1/31/1972 (Going to NYY: P R. Jones. Going to CHC: RF B. Murcer)...
Earned first career win on 9/29/1972...
Injured on 5/21/1976 with a Inflamed Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 3 weeks...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 6/1/1976, going 4-0, 0.96...
Was selected to the 1976 Allstar game...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 8/1/1976, going 6-0, 2.08...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/1/1976, winning 2 games with a 1.06 ERA...
Injured on 10/14/1976 with a Ruptured Tricep Tendon, out for 4-5 weeks...
Won World Series with New York (A) in 1976...
Injured on 6/27/1977 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Injured on 4/27/1978 with a Ruptured Bicep Tendon, out for 4 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/8/1978, winning 2 games with a 1.50 ERA...
